4 
5 EsdfOccIntegrator::EsdfOccIntegrator(const Config& config,
6  Layer<OccupancyVoxel>* occ_layer,
7  Layer<EsdfVoxel>* esdf_layer)
8  : config_(config), occ_layer_(occ_layer), esdf_layer_(esdf_layer) {
9  CHECK_NOTNULL(occ_layer_);
10  CHECK_NOTNULL(esdf_layer_);
11 
12  esdf_voxels_per_side_ = esdf_layer_->voxels_per_side();
13  esdf_voxel_size_ = esdf_layer_->voxel_size();
14 
15  open_.setNumBuckets(config_.num_buckets, config_.max_distance_m);
16 }
17 
18 // Fixed is overloaded as occupied in this case.
19 void EsdfOccIntegrator::updateFromOccLayerBatch() {
20  esdf_layer_->removeAllBlocks();
21  BlockIndexList occ_blocks;
22  occ_layer_->getAllAllocatedBlocks(&occ_blocks);
23  updateFromOccBlocks(occ_blocks);
24 }
25 
26 void EsdfOccIntegrator::updateFromOccBlocks(const BlockIndexList& occ_blocks) {
27  DCHECK_EQ(occ_layer_->voxels_per_side(), esdf_layer_->voxels_per_side());
28  timing::Timer esdf_timer("esdf_occ");
29 
30  // Get a specific list of voxels in the TSDF layer, and propagate out from
31  // there.
32  // Go through all blocks in TSDF and copy their values for relevant voxels.
33  size_t num_lower = 0u;
34  size_t num_raise = 0u;
35  size_t num_new = 0u;
36  timing::Timer propagate_timer("esdf_occ/propagate_tsdf");
37  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: Propagating " << occ_blocks.size()
38  << " updated blocks from the TSDF.";
39  for (const BlockIndex& block_index : occ_blocks) {
40  const Block<OccupancyVoxel>& occ_block =
41  occ_layer_->getBlockByIndex(block_index);
42 
43  // Allocate the same block in the ESDF layer.
44  // Block indices are the same across all layers.
45  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr esdf_block =
46  esdf_layer_->allocateBlockPtrByIndex(block_index);
47 
48  // TODO(helenol): assumes that TSDF and ESDF layer are the same size.
49  // This will not always be true...
50  const size_t num_voxels_per_block = occ_block.num_voxels();
51 
52  for (size_t lin_index = 0u; lin_index < num_voxels_per_block; ++lin_index) {
53  const OccupancyVoxel& occ_voxel =
54  occ_block.getVoxelByLinearIndex(lin_index);
55 
56  if (!occ_voxel.observed) {
57  continue;
58  }
59 
60  EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel = esdf_block->getVoxelByLinearIndex(lin_index);
61  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
62  esdf_block->computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(lin_index);
63  // Check for frontier voxels.
64  // This is the check for the lower frontier.
65  // If the occupancy voxel is occupied... Count unknown as free.
66  if (occ_voxel.probability_log > 0.0) {
67  // Assume batch for now.
68  esdf_voxel.distance = 0.0;
69  esdf_voxel.observed = true;
70  esdf_voxel.fixed = true;
71  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
72 
73  esdf_voxel.in_queue = true;
74  open_.push(std::make_pair(block_index, voxel_index),
75  esdf_voxel.distance);
76  num_lower++;
77  } else {
78  esdf_voxel.distance = config_.default_distance_m;
79  esdf_voxel.observed = true;
80  esdf_voxel.fixed = false;
81  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
82  // No need to push to open...
83  num_new++;
84  }
85  }
86  }
87  propagate_timer.Stop();
88  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: Lower: " << num_lower << " Raise: " << num_raise
89  << " New: " << num_new;
90 
91  timing::Timer raise_timer("esdf_occ/raise_esdf");
92  // Process the open set now.
93  // processRaiseSet();
94  raise_timer.Stop();
95 
96  timing::Timer update_timer("esdf_occ/update_esdf");
97  // Process the open set now.
98  processOpenSet();
99  update_timer.Stop();
100 
101  esdf_timer.Stop();
102 }
103 
104 void EsdfOccIntegrator::processOpenSet() {
105  size_t num_updates = 0u;
106  while (!open_.empty()) {
107  VoxelKey kv = open_.front();
108  open_.pop();
109 
110  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr esdf_block =
111  esdf_layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(kv.first);
112  EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel = esdf_block->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(kv.second);
113 
114  // Again, no point updating unobserved voxels.
115  if (!esdf_voxel.observed) {
116  esdf_voxel.in_queue = false;
117  continue;
118  }
119 
120  // Don't bother propagating this -- can't make any active difference.
121  if (esdf_voxel.distance >= config_.max_distance_m) {
122  esdf_voxel.in_queue = false;
123  continue;
124  }
125  // See if you can update the neighbors.
126  AlignedVector<VoxelKey> neighbors;
127  AlignedVector<float> distances;
128  AlignedVector<Eigen::Vector3i> directions;
129  getNeighborsAndDistances(kv.first, kv.second, &neighbors, &distances,
130  &directions);
131 
132  // Do NOT update unobserved distances.
133  CHECK_EQ(neighbors.size(), distances.size());
134  for (size_t i = 0; i < neighbors.size(); ++i) {
135  BlockIndex neighbor_block_index = neighbors[i].first;
136  VoxelIndex neighbor_voxel_index = neighbors[i].second;
137 
138  // Get the block for this voxel.
139  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr neighbor_block;
140  if (neighbor_block_index == kv.first) {
141  neighbor_block = esdf_block;
142  } else {
143  neighbor_block = esdf_layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(neighbor_block_index);
144  }
145  if (!neighbor_block) {
146  continue;
147  }
148  CHECK(neighbor_block->isValidVoxelIndex(neighbor_voxel_index))
149  << "Neigbor voxel index: " << neighbor_voxel_index.transpose();
150 
151  EsdfVoxel& neighbor_voxel =
152  neighbor_block->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(neighbor_voxel_index);
153 
154  if (!neighbor_voxel.observed) {
155  continue;
156  }
157 
158  const FloatingPoint distance_to_neighbor =
159  distances[i] * esdf_voxel_size_;
160 
161  if (!neighbor_voxel.fixed &&
162  esdf_voxel.distance + distance_to_neighbor <
163  neighbor_voxel.distance) {
164  neighbor_voxel.distance = esdf_voxel.distance + distance_to_neighbor;
165  // Also update parent.
166  neighbor_voxel.parent = -directions[i];
167  // ONLY propagate this if we're below the max distance!
168  if (neighbor_voxel.distance < config_.max_distance_m) {
169  if (!neighbor_voxel.in_queue) {
170  open_.push(neighbors[i], neighbor_voxel.distance);
171  neighbor_voxel.in_queue = true;
172  }
173  }
174  }
175 
176  if (neighbor_voxel.fixed &&
177  esdf_voxel.distance - distance_to_neighbor >
178  neighbor_voxel.distance) {
179  neighbor_voxel.distance = esdf_voxel.distance - distance_to_neighbor;
180  // Also update parent.
181  neighbor_voxel.parent = -directions[i];
182  if (!neighbor_voxel.in_queue) {
183  open_.push(neighbors[i], neighbor_voxel.distance);
184  neighbor_voxel.in_queue = true;
185  }
186  }
187  }
188 
189  num_updates++;
190  esdf_voxel.in_queue = false;
191  }
192 
193  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: made " << num_updates << " voxel updates.";
194 }
195 
196 // Uses 26-connectivity and quasi-Euclidean distances.
197 // Directions is the direction that the neighbor voxel lives in. If you
198 // need the direction FROM the neighbor voxel TO the current voxel, take
199 // negative of the given direction.
200 void EsdfOccIntegrator::getNeighborsAndDistances(
201  const BlockIndex& block_index, const VoxelIndex& voxel_index,
202  AlignedVector<VoxelKey>* neighbors, AlignedVector<float>* distances,
203  AlignedVector<Eigen::Vector3i>* directions) const {
204  CHECK_NOTNULL(neighbors);
205  CHECK_NOTNULL(distances);
206  CHECK_NOTNULL(directions);
207 
208  static const double kSqrt2 = std::sqrt(2);
209  static const double kSqrt3 = std::sqrt(3);
210  static const size_t kNumNeighbors = 26;
211 
212  neighbors->reserve(kNumNeighbors);
213  distances->reserve(kNumNeighbors);
214  directions->reserve(kNumNeighbors);
215 
216  VoxelKey neighbor;
217  Eigen::Vector3i direction;
218  direction.setZero();
219  // Distance 1 set.
220  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
221  for (int j = -1; j <= 1; j += 2) {
222  direction(i) = j;
223  getNeighbor(block_index, voxel_index, direction, &neighbor.first,
224  &neighbor.second);
225  neighbors->emplace_back(neighbor);
226  distances->emplace_back(1.0);
227  directions->emplace_back(direction);
228  }
229  direction(i) = 0;
230  }
231 
232  // Distance sqrt(2) set.
233  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
234  unsigned int next_i = (i + 1) % 3;
235  for (int j = -1; j <= 1; j += 2) {
236  direction(i) = j;
237  for (int k = -1; k <= 1; k += 2) {
238  direction(next_i) = k;
239  getNeighbor(block_index, voxel_index, direction, &neighbor.first,
240  &neighbor.second);
241  neighbors->emplace_back(neighbor);
242  distances->emplace_back(kSqrt2);
243  directions->emplace_back(direction);
244  }
245  direction(i) = 0;
246  direction(next_i) = 0;
247  }
248  }
249 
250  // Distance sqrt(3) set.
251  for (int i = -1; i <= 1; i += 2) {
252  direction(0) = i;
253  for (int j = -1; j <= 1; j += 2) {
254  direction(1) = j;
255  for (int k = -1; k <= 1; k += 2) {
256  direction(2) = k;
257  getNeighbor(block_index, voxel_index, direction, &neighbor.first,
258  &neighbor.second);
259  neighbors->emplace_back(neighbor);
260  distances->emplace_back(kSqrt3);
261  directions->emplace_back(direction);
262  }
263  }
264  }
265 
266  CHECK_EQ(neighbors->size(), kNumNeighbors);
267 }
268 
269 void EsdfOccIntegrator::getNeighbor(const BlockIndex& block_index,
270  const VoxelIndex& voxel_index,
271  const Eigen::Vector3i& direction,
272  BlockIndex* neighbor_block_index,
273  VoxelIndex* neighbor_voxel_index) const {
274  DCHECK(neighbor_block_index != NULL);
275  DCHECK(neighbor_voxel_index != NULL);
276 
277  *neighbor_block_index = block_index;
278  *neighbor_voxel_index = voxel_index + direction;
279 
280  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
281  if ((*neighbor_voxel_index)(i) < 0) {
282  (*neighbor_block_index)(i)--;
283  (*neighbor_voxel_index)(i) += esdf_voxels_per_side_;
284  } else if ((*neighbor_voxel_index)(i) >=
285  static_cast<IndexElement>(esdf_voxels_per_side_)) {
286  (*neighbor_block_index)(i)++;
287  (*neighbor_voxel_index)(i) -= esdf_voxels_per_side_;
288  }
289  }
290 }
